# private(_:)

**Type Method**

Enables managed CloudKit sync using the specified ubiquity container.

## Declaration

```swift
static func `private`(_ privateDBName: String) -> ModelConfiguration.CloudKitDatabase
```

## Parameters

- **privateDBName**: The identifier of the iCloud ubiquity container to use. You find these in the iCloud capabilities section of your Xcode project. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode/configuring-icloud-services].

## Getting discovery options

- **automatic**: Enables managed CloudKit sync using the primary ubiquity container from the app’s entitlements.
- **none**: Disables managed CloudKit sync.
